pkgmetadata.longdescription: An S4 Class for Functional Data // S4 classes for univariate and multivariate functional data with utility functions. See doi:10.18637/jss.v093.i05 for a detailed description of the package functionalities and its interplay with the MFPCA package for multivariate functional principal component analysis https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=MFPCA.
